function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic impacting the health of construction workers in construction projects (CP).","Impact":"Increased risk of infections, absenteeism, and health complications for construction workers.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, providing adequate medical support, and promoting vaccination programs for construction workers.","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and remote health monitoring technologies.","People":"Construction workers, construction project managers, health and safety authorities.","Owner":"Construction companies, health and safety authorities."},{"Description":"Decline in revenue for construction projects due to impacts of COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"Financial instability, project delays, and reduced investment in construction projects.","Mitigation":"Diversifying revenue sources, seeking government support, and implementing cost-saving measures.","Technologies":"Financial forecasting and analysis tools, project management software, and budget optimization systems.","People":"Construction project managers, financial analysts, government agencies.","Owner":"Construction companies, government agencies."},{"Description":"Disruption of construction activity due to the socio-economic-environmental impacts of COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"Delays in project timelines, resource shortages, and logistical challenges.","Mitigation":"Adopting flexible work schedules, optimizing supply chain management, and implementing remote collaboration tools.","Technologies":"Project management software, supply chain optimization systems, communication and collaboration platforms.","People":"Construction project managers, supply chain managers, contractors.","Owner":"Construction companies, supply chain managers."}]}
